mapper.update:
update drug
SERIAL_UMBER = #{serialUmber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOSAGE_FORM = #{dosageForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOSAGE_FORM_DRUG = #{dosageFormDrug,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPECIFICATIONS = #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONVERSION_COEFFICIENT_no = #{conversionCoefficientNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME_OF_MANUFACTURER = #{nameOfManufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADE_NAME = #{tradeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BID_PRICE = #{bidPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMON_NAME_PINYIN = #{commonNamePinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_PHOTOS = #{productPhotos,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPROVAL_NUMBER = #{approvalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALIDITY_PERIOD_OF_APPROVAL_NUMBER = #{validityPeriodOfApprovalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMPORTED_DRUGS = #{importedDrugs,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PACKING_MATERIAL = #{packingMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PACKAGING_UNIT = #{packagingUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LATEST_RETAIL_PRICE = #{latestRetailPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
RETAIL_PRICE_SOURCE = #{retailPriceSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUALITY_LEVEL = #{qualityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUALITY_LEVEL_DESCRIPTION = #{qualityLevelDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRUG_INSPECTION_REPORT = #{drugInspectionReport,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DRUG_INSPECTION_REPORT_NO = #{drugInspectionReportNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALIDITY_PERIOD_OF_DRUG_INSPECTION_REPORT = #{validityPeriodOfDrugInspectionReport,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION = #{productDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRUG_CATEGORY = #{drugCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRUG_TRADE_STATUS = #{drugTradeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update drug set SERIAL_UMBER = #{serialUmber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOSAGE_FORM = #{dosageForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOSAGE_FORM_DRUG = #{dosageFormDrug,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPECIFICATIONS = #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONVERSION_COEFFICIENT_no = #{conversionCoefficientNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME_OF_MANUFACTURER = #{nameOfManufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADE_NAME = #{tradeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BID_PRICE = #{bidPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMON_NAME_PINYIN = #{commonNamePinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_PHOTOS = #{productPhotos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVAL_NUMBER = #{approvalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALIDITY_PERIOD_OF_APPROVAL_NUMBER = #{validityPeriodOfApprovalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMPORTED_DRUGS = #{importedDrugs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PACKING_MATERIAL = #{packingMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PACKAGING_UNIT = #{packagingUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATEST_RETAIL_PRICE = #{latestRetailPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, RETAIL_PRICE_SOURCE = #{retailPriceSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUALITY_LEVEL = #{qualityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUALITY_LEVEL_DESCRIPTION = #{qualityLevelDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRUG_INSPECTION_REPORT = #{drugInspectionReport,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DRUG_INSPECTION_REPORT_NO = #{drugInspectionReportNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALIDITY_PERIOD_OF_DRUG_INSPECTION_REPORT = #{validityPeriodOfDrugInspectionReport,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION = #{productDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRUG_CATEGORY = #{drugCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRUG_TRADE_STATUS = #{drugTradeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select from drug
and SERIAL_UMBER like CONCAT("%",#{serialUmber},"%")
and DOSAGE_FORM like CONCAT("%",#{dosageForm},"%")
and DOSAGE_FORM_DRUG like CONCAT("%",#{dosageFormDrug},"%")
and SPECIFICATIONS like CONCAT("%",#{specifications},"%")
and COMPANY like CONCAT("%",#{company},"%")
and CONVERSION_COEFFICIENT_no like CONCAT("%",#{conversionCoefficientNo},"%")
and NAME_OF_MANUFACTURER like CONCAT("%",#{nameOfManufacturer},"%")
and TRADE_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{tradeName},"%")
and QUALITY_LEVEL like CONCAT("%",#{qualityLevel},"%")
and DRUG_CATEGORY like CONCAT("%",#{drugCategory},"%")
and DRUG_TRADE_STATUS like CONCAT("%",#{drugTradeStatus},"%")
and BID_PRICE between #{startPrice} and #{endPrice}
limit #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from drug
and SERIAL_UMBER like CONCAT("%",#{serialUmber},"%")
and DOSAGE_FORM like CONCAT("%",#{dosageForm},"%")
and DOSAGE_FORM_DRUG like CONCAT("%",#{dosageFormDrug},"%")
and SPECIFICATIONS like CONCAT("%",#{specifications},"%")
and COMPANY like CONCAT("%",#{company},"%")
and CONVERSION_COEFFICIENT_no like CONCAT("%",#{conversionCoefficientNo},"%")
and NAME_OF_MANUFACTURER like CONCAT("%",#{nameOfManufacturer},"%")
and TRADE_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{tradeName},"%")
and QUALITY_LEVEL like CONCAT("%",#{qualityLevel},"%")
and DRUG_CATEGORY like CONCAT("%",#{drugCategory},"%")
and DRUG_TRADE_STATUS like CONCAT("%",#{drugTradeStatus},"%")
and BID_PRICE between #{startPrice} and #{endPrice}

select d.*,b.name_of_enterprise from drug d join supplier_drug s on d.id = s.drug_information_id join vendor_information b on s.enterprise_id = b.supplier_id
and SERIAL_UMBER like CONCAT("%",#{serialUmber},"%")
and DOSAGE_FORM like CONCAT("%",#{dosageForm},"%")
and DOSAGE_FORM_DRUG like CONCAT("%",#{dosageFormDrug},"%")
and SPECIFICATIONS like CONCAT("%",#{specifications},"%")
and COMPANY like CONCAT("%",#{company},"%")
and CONVERSION_COEFFICIENT_no like CONCAT("%",#{conversionCoefficientNo},"%")
and NAME_OF_MANUFACTURER like CONCAT("%",#{nameOfManufacturer},"%")
and TRADE_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{tradeName},"%")
and QUALITY_LEVEL like CONCAT("%",#{qualityLevel},"%")
and DRUG_CATEGORY like CONCAT("%",#{drugCategory},"%")
and BID_PRICE between #{startPrice} and #{endPrice}
and DRUG_TRADE_STATUS = 1 and FLAG = 1
limit #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from drug d join supplier_drug s on d.id = s.drug_information_id join vendor_information b on s.enterprise_id = b.supplier_id
and SERIAL_UMBER like CONCAT("%",#{serialUmber},"%")
and DOSAGE_FORM like CONCAT("%",#{dosageForm},"%")
and DOSAGE_FORM_DRUG like CONCAT("%",#{dosageFormDrug},"%")
and SPECIFICATIONS like CONCAT("%",#{specifications},"%")
and COMPANY like CONCAT("%",#{company},"%")
and CONVERSION_COEFFICIENT_no like CONCAT("%",#{conversionCoefficientNo},"%")
and NAME_OF_MANUFACTURER like CONCAT("%",#{nameOfManufacturer},"%")
and TRADE_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{tradeName},"%")
and QUALITY_LEVEL like CONCAT("%",#{qualityLevel},"%")
and DRUG_CATEGORY like CONCAT("%",#{drugCategory},"%")
and BID_PRICE between #{startPrice} and #{endPrice}
and DRUG_TRADE_STATUS = 1 and FLAG = 1

select d.*,b.* from drug d join supplier_drug s on d.id = s.drug_information_id join vendor_information b on s.enterprise_id = b.supplier_id where id in
#{item}
